title: Rotational Motion
description: Schema describing rotational motion of an object around a fixed axis.

objectId.description: Unique identifier of the rotating object.

angularVelocity.description: Angular velocity (radians per second). Positive indicates right-hand rule direction.

initialAngle.description: Initial rotation angle at time zero (radians).

momentOfInertia.description: Moment of inertia of the object (kg·m²). Optional, used for physics calculations.

torque.description: Constant torque applied about the rotation axis (N·m). Optional.

repeat.description: Whether the rotation animation repeats after completion.
